original_title: Walking With Lions: Lions Of Darkness
overview: The eight lionesses soon give birth to their new leadersâ€™ cubs and there are young everywhere, feeding, playing and training for survival. But danger lurks behind virtually every bush, whether from ever-present hyenas or from a clever mongoose.  One lonely cub, born late and orphaned early, endures hardships so heart-rending the filmmakers were tempted to intervene. But they decided to let nature run its unpredictable course.
title: Walking With Lions: Lions Of Darkness
